ISSUE.TITLE: test case: add more test cases for jwt plugin.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: - we only test `HS256` algorithm, not cover `HS512` and `RS256` - not test unsupported algorithm, for example `HS384`. we need throw the `unsupported alg` msg from https://github.com/SkyLothar/lua-resty-jwt/blob/master/lib/resty/jwt.lua#L505

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix: jwt-auth plugin RS256 algorithm is not easy to use. (#2523) fix: add more test cases for jwt plugin. (#2355) fix #2523 fix #2355

feat(jwt-auth): support to use of the RS256 algorithm (#2594) * example for #2523 * fix: jwt-auth plugin RS256 algorithm is not easy to use. (#2523) fix: add more test cases for jwt plugin. (#2355) fix #2523 fix #2355
